mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, password, name, nickname, role, status, created_at, updated_at FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
SELECT user_id, email, password, name, nickname, role, status, created_at, updated_at FROM user WHERE email = #{email} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET email = #{email}, name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
UPDATE user SET status = 'DISABLED', updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( email, password, name, nickname, role, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{role}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW() )
